metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000024 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Shotwell version 0.24.4 or earlier and 0.25.3 or earlier is vulnerable toan information disclosure in the web publishing plugins resulting inpotential password and oauth token plaintext transmission

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000024` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

shotwell - 0.18.0-0ubuntu4.5
shotwell-common - 0.18.0-0ubuntu4.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shotwell package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.18.0-0ubuntu4.5').
